title: Shriram Transport Finance Raises Fixed Deposit Interest Rates By Up To 25bps | Mint - Mint
content: Shriram Transport Finance Raises Fixed Deposit Interest Rates By Up To 25bps | Mint  Mint
description: The revised rates of interest are 6.5% for 12 months, 6.75% for 24 months, 7.75% for 36 months, 7.8% for 48 months, and 7.9% for a 60-month tenure
